modName: Face Shop - Face Texture Options in Race Menu
summary: Allows you to scroll through several different face textures in the Race  Menu, instead of having to install/uninstall to try them.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod\'s page. 

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don\'t know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I\'ll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]
Please read the entire description to avoid neck seams. Thank you.

**Known Issues: Some users have reported their changes disappearing after saving, quitting, and reloading. If this happens to you please let me know in the comments, as I\'m still trying to figure out what\'s causing this. THanks!**


[size=5][b]INTRODUCTION
[/b][/size]I got tremendously tired of installing/uninstalling several face mods for when I wanted to create a new character or NPC, so I made this! I\'ve had it complete for a while now, but took screenshots and packaged everything up today. 

This adds new \'complexions\' to the Race menu for the human races that change the diffuse map, normal map, and specular map to one for various compatible face mods. You will select the version for your body type and texture. 

This initial release contains 4 versions. Make sure you\'re using the correct body textures or you will have neck seams.

This mod does NOT interfere with your installed face mod, and you will still have the original options available to you. You do not need to uninstall anything, and this file doesnt overwrite anything. (The exception being the UNP version which overwrites the default female subsurface texture, but most face textures don\'t include this file anyway because it can create a neck seam if it doesn\'t match the body)


[size=5][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/size]
It is highly reccomended you install/uninstall this mod using NMM. Simply hit the \'download with manager\' button and activate this mod after your body textures are installed.

[size=5][b]UNINSTALLATION
[/b][/size]Uninstall with NMM -or-
Delete textures/00natilde/faceoptions

 
[b][size=5]VERSIONS
[/size][/b][size=3][b]Face Options for Fair Skin ADEC CBBE UNP DELICATE v1.0[/b][/size]
Requires: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666]Fair Skin Complexion for ADEC User[/url]
[size=2]OR
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666]Fair Skin for CBBE v3[/url]
OR
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666]Fair Skin Complexion for UNP/B/C[/url] -AND- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20530]UNP Delicate 4.1[/url]
[/size]
[size=2]01 - ADEC Official Face (will still work with CBBE or UNP :D)
02 - Pretty Face
03 - Envision Face
04 - Nidia\'s Face
05 - Univision Face
06 - Fair Face v3 
07 - Fair Face v3 Freckled
08 - Fair Face v4 
09 - Fair Face v4 Freckled
10 - Ashen/Oriental Face
11 - Placeholder/Custom Combination
12 - PLaceholder/Custom Combination
[/size]

[size=3][b]Face Options for Fair Skin UNP Regular v1.0[/b][/size]
Requires: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666]Fair Skin Complexion for UNP/B/C User
[/url]
[size=2]01 - Envision Face v2
02 - Envision Face v3
03 - Navetsea Face
04 - Pretty Face
05 - Pretty Face Mashup
06 - Univision

08 - Placeholder/Custom Combination

[/size]

[size=3][b]Face Options for UNP Official Body Textures v1.1[/b][/size]
Requires: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Body with original or 1.51 textures[/url]

^^ A lot of these were converted by me for the UNP body. If something isn\'t perfect let me know and I\'ll fix it. If I converted your face texture and you want to upload the conversion to your mod\'s page, please do, no permission from me is needed, I just added the neck. 


[b][size=3]Face Options for CBBE Official Body[/size]

[/size][/b]

[b][size=5]PLANNED UPDATES
[/size][/b]This mod is almost complete and entirely playable, but I will be adding the following:
- Navetsea Body Textures Version
- Elven Races?
- Faces I\'ve converted to UNP/CBBE 
- User Requested faces/changes
- More Freckle options, beauty marks
- An article on texture blending and how this mod was made.
- NPC\'s complexions changed for more NPC variety!
